moves.2. Nc3: Not too bad. I like e5.
moves.2... h6: ? A poor move in the Opening. I think best is e5 or d6.
moves.4. Nf3 Bg4 5. Bb5+: I believe that this is a waste of time; all black can do is c6 (which kinda improves his game) and white must retreat.
moves.11. O-O e5 12. Bg5: Threatening Bxf6 gxf6 Qxf6 winning a pawn!
moves.13. Ne2: Hmm, not really best, as you'll see!
moves.13... b5: ! After Bb3, a4 winning the Bishop!
moves.14. Bxb5 cxb5: Now, I think, whites in trouble...
moves.19. Bxa5: Now white is down by 1 pawn.
moves.23. Nxb5: Now the material is equal, but the position is not! White has 2 pass pawns!!
moves.23... g5: It doesn't seem black cares, yet....
moves.24. Qb6 Nc5 25. Rc3: ? Hmmm, why do this? It just losses a pawn (on e4) Why not Nc3?
moves.34... Rgb8 35. bxa8=Q Rxa8 36. Rb1: I think that white has an advantage, don't you?
moves.38... f5 39. Bxc5 e4: ?? Huh? Why not just take this Bishop.
moves.40. Bd4 f4 41. Rgb3 Kd7 42. Rb3b7+ Kc8 4: It's all down hill from here...
moves.43... Rxb8 44. Rxb8+: White has an easy win, I think.
